Auto Zone Switching
自動區域切換
Auto-vacuum zone switching is an innovative solution that allows the routers vacuum hold down to be automatically switched over depending on which zone the tool isoperating in.

Focusing on productivity, AXYZ has engineered machine
專注於生產力Focusing on productivity, AXYZ has engineered machine
Focusing on productivity, AXYZ has engineered machine configurations and tooling options to provide your business with the router best suited to your needs.
專注於生產，AXYZ 所設計製造之機台組態及刀具配件可提供最合乎客戶需求的雕刻機。
For a better visualisation, see the sample chart below forsome ofthe sizes wecommonly deliver toour customers.
可參考下列圖表以更清楚地了解我們一般提供於客戶之尺寸。
For applications that need adeeper throat clearance such as mould making orthree dimensional carving, extended
用於需要更深的高度間隙之工件如模具製造或三維雕刻，可延長高度間隙。
For cutting non-ferrous metals including aluminium, brass and copper, the Unist mister operates with more precision and reliability than any other dispensing system available.
當切削非鐵金屬如鋁、黃銅以及銅，Unist 切削液噴嘴操作比起其他噴嘴系統更精準且更可靠。
For larger applications requiring full process width ofasingle carriage, the second carriage can conveniently be parked atthe end ofthe gantry.
當用於需要全部支架範圍之大型工件時，第二刀架可停放於支架末端。
For larger hold down requirements, multiple pumps are often run in parallel to create greater CFM flow.
若有更大的抽氣需求，可並行使用多重泵以產生更大的 CFM 流。

Integrated Solutions Delivering everything our Customers need
整合式解決方案提供我們的客戶一切所需

Integrated pressure foot with adjustable tension to hold down materials under heavy cut pressures.The heavy duty drag knife is designed for knife cutting applications that involve heavy gauge flexible materials.
整合式可調張力壓力腳能於切割時的高壓下固定材料，重型拖刀專為重型彈性材料切割應用設計。
Intergrated pressure foot with adjustable tension tohold down materials under heavy cutpressures.
整合式可調張力壓力腳能於切割時的高壓下固定材料。
It can also be used forcutting vinyl on large format flex faced signs.
也可用於切割大型塑膠看板。
It delivers a constant vacuum and is therefore suitable for use inavariety of applications on allAXYZ Series Routers.
可提供恆定真空，因此適用於所有 AXYZ 系列雕刻機之多樣化的應用。
It has been specifically engineered to accept 50mm or100mm diameter hose and allows formanual adjustment ofthe ride height forfaster material and tool setup often demanded intodays busy workplace.
其設計適用於直徑 50mm 或 100mm 軟管，並能手動調整高度以加速材料和工具的安裝。
It is a particularly useful option forconverting existing templates and fixtures into automated cutting files where original drawings donot exist.
特別用於無原始圖檔時，轉換現有模板或裝置為自動切割檔案。
It may also be used for cutting vinyl on flex faced and vacuum formed pan signs.
也可用於切割金屬看板上之軟面及真空成形塑膠。
It provides a graphical preview and current status of a running job and allows program feeds and speeds to be changed without pausing the program.
其提供了圖形化預覽和目前運行中作業之狀態，並允許程式進料和行進中更改速度。
It will work with all 5 and 10 HP spindles (Elte or HSD).
可用於所有 5 和 10 HP 主軸 (Elte 或 HSD)。
Itfitsto a standard 20mm collet and works with all5 HP and 10 HP spindles.
適用標準 20mm 夾頭，可用於所有 5 HP 和 10 HP 主軸。

The 10HP Becker dryvane vacuum pump is perfectly suited forvacuum hold down on allAXYZ Series Routers.
10HP Becker 乾式葉片真空泵適合用於所有 AXYZ 系列雕刻機真空抽氣。
The 4000 Series machine is popular in the commercial sign, woodworking, marine, POP, and education industries for iI's fit with many common materials, and overall footprint.
4000 系列機台廣泛用於廣告看板、木工、船舶、POP 以及教育產業, 其適用於多數常見材料。
The 5.0HP and 10.8 HP HSD quick release spindles are incredibly quiet and robust.
5.0HP 和 10.8 HP HSD 快速釋放主軸極為安靜和耐用。
The 5Y pressure foot plays justasvital arole asthe high capacity pressure foot.
5Y 壓力腳與高容量壓力腳為同要重要的配件，
The 6000 Series offers a full 2159mm of processing width standard to ensure your materials willfit without culling them down.
6000 系列能處理工件寬度達 2159mm 以確保能完全容納您的材料。
The 8.5HP regenerative blower option isa low cost solution forvacuum hold down where the required cutparts are a minimum of1250 sq cm insize.
8.5HP 再生鼓風機為低價的真空抽氣解決方案，適用於尺寸 1250 平方公分以上工件。
The A2MC connects to your local network forinstant program download.
A2MC 可連接內部網路下載程式。
The A2MC is AXYZ International's next generation machine control system and is fitted as standard on all Series machines.
A2MC 為 AXYZ 國際之新一代機台控制系統，其為所有系列機台之標準配備，
The ACM swarf collection system isa high pressure swarf collector that is configured forthe efficient collection of aluminium, aluminium composite, wood and plastic swarf.
ACM 集屑系統為一種高壓集屑器，可有效收集鋁、鋁合金、木製品以及塑膠切屑。
The AXYZ 4000 Series CNC Router is the smallest full size machine AXYZ builds.
AXYZ 4000 系列 CNC 雕刻機為 AXYZ 所製造最小的全尺寸機台。
The AXYZ 5000 Series CNC Router is our most popular size format.
AXYZ 5000 系列 CNC 雕刻機為 AXYZ 最受歡迎的機台尺寸。
The AXYZ 6000 Series CNC Router delivers the largest processing width for this style of machine on the market.
AXYZ 6000 系列 CNC 雕刻機為市場上同行機台中可處理最大工件之機台。
The AXYZ 7G and 21G automatic tool changer systems provide an easy and convenient method ofrunning jobsrequiring multiple routing tools.
AXYZ 7G 和 21G 自動換刀系統提供運行多路徑工作方便快捷的方法。
The AXYZ 8000 Series has the largest standard width of our smaller format machines with an impressive 2635mm process width.
AXYZ 8000 系列為小型機台中可處理最大工件寬度的機台，加工寬度可達 2635mm。
The AXYZ Vision System is a low cost solution, fast to setup, easy to use and suitable for most print to cut applications using router, knife or both cutting tools.
AXYZ 視覺系統為低成本的解決方案，可快速地安裝，使用方便，適合大多數使用路達、刀具或這兩種切割工具之列印刷切割應用。
The AXYZ brand offers the most diverse range of CNC Routers in the industry.
AXYZ 提供業界中最廣泛的 CNC 雕刻機。
The AXYZ knife tools and camera registration options have been developed for the graphics and print À nishing market.
AXYZ 刀具和攝影定位系統配件專為圖形和印刷處理市場所開發，
The AXYZ oscillating tangential knife option isan important tool forany company that needs to process thin flexible materials including foam core, gator foam, corrugated plastic orcardboard.
AXYZ 擺動裁刀配件為加工輕薄彈性材料之重要刀具，可處理泡棉，展立板、塑膠瓦楞或瓦楞紙，
The Bellows Seal significantly enhances the dust extraction process byhelping to create acyclonic vortex within the pressure foot chamber.
波紋密封管可幫助壓力腳腔體內產生旋轉渦流並顯著地增強吸塵能力。
The Brush Donut avoids any marking of the material whilst atthe same time providing an effective solution forthe removal of dust and swarf.
刷環能高效率地清除灰塵和切屑且不留下任何刮痕。
The Hypertherm plasma cutting option with AXYZ machine and control excellence provides an unbeatable combination.
AXYZ 機台之 Hypertherm 電漿切削配件與優異的控制提供了無懈可擊的組合。
The Mink pump is oil free and can be run continuously if required.
Mink 泵為無油式，可持續運轉。
The Mink rotary claw pump isan ideal high performance solution for powerful vacuum hold down.
Mink 爪式轉子泵為高效能的強力真空抽氣解決方案，
The Nose Rider Collar sets the protrusion of the cutting tool through the bottom ofthe foot to ensure an accurate and consistent depth of cut.
凸出式移動接環使刀具由壓力腳下方突出以確保精準且一致的切割深度。
The Oscillating Tangential knife is designed to provide high accuracy cutting of a wide range of semi rigid materials.
擺動裁刀之設計可提供大範圍半剛性材料之高精確切割，
The Oscillating knife in conjunction with the AXYZ AVS Vision System delivers incredible value for any print to cut operation.
擺動刀配合 AXYZ AVS 視覺系統使用能勝任任何的印刷切割操作。
The Oscillating knife in conjunction with the AXYZ AVS-IP system delivers incredible value for any print to cut operation.
擺動刀配合 AXYZ AVS-IP 視覺系統使用能勝任任何的印刷切割操作。
The Oscillating knife is available with a wide range of blade lengths and attack angles, to suit a wide variety of materials.
擺動刀有廣泛的刀鋒長度範圍及不同攻角可供選擇，以滿足各種材料切割需求。
The Tangential Knife adds the robustness needed for heavier knife cutting applications than the vinyl knife can accommodate.
裁刀為堅固耐用的切削刀具，用於塑膠刀無法處理之較厚重材料。
The box cutter cartridge holds straight, multi purpose blades suitable forcutting awide variety of materials from thin polyester film to thick card and foam board.
紙箱切刀之裁刀匣垂直固定用於切割多種不同材料之多功能刀具，可切割塑膠薄片、厚卡紙以及泡綿板等材料。
The cold airgun isasimple device that utilises filtered, compressed airand a venturi effect expansion chamber to produce cold airforspot cooling.
冷卻氣槍使用過濾壓縮空氣，並利用流量效應膨脹室產生冷空氣以進行冷卻。
The creasing wheel cartridge can be fitted with arange ofdifferent sized and profiled creasing wheels for use in sample making applications.
壓花輪刀匣可用於樣品製作應用之壓花輪，可裝載多種不同尺寸以及外型。
The creasing wheels which are sold separately are easily interchanged using a precision push fit mechanism.
壓花輪另行販售，藉由精密推入固定機構可輕鬆更換。
The engraver equipped AXYZ Router table isagreat alternative forlarge format engraving.
裝有雕刻器之 AXYZ 路達桌為大型雕刻的良好選擇，
The engraver isspecifically designed forlight duty engraving on an AXYZ Series orMillennium CNC Router.
雕刻器為專門為了 AXYZ 系列或 Millennium CNC 雕刻機進行輕型所設計，
The heavy duty drag knife is designed for knife cutting applications that involve heavy gauge flexible materials.
重型拖刀專為重型彈性材料切割應用設計，

The helical pinions would normally be driven bythe optional high performance servo motors through precision planetary gearboxes, resulting inavery rigid and powerful drive system suitable foruse in all high precision and demanding applications.
螺旋齒條和齒輪可由高性能的選配伺服馬達透過行星齒輪變速箱驅動，可為高精密和高品質要求之應用提供穩定且強大的驅動系統
The helical rack and pinion system is designed to provide superior high speed performance delivering greater accuracy, smoother culling
螺旋齒條和齒輪系統之設計能提供優越的高速性能並提供更準確、更順暢的換刀
The high capacity swarf extraction foot isavital component ofyour AXYZ International CNC Router machine.
高容量集屑腳為 AXYZ 國際雕刻機台的重要的元件，
The laser digitiser provides afast and accurate way of capturing the geometry of any two dimentional part that is placed on the table.
雷射數位轉換器可快速且精確地抓取所有放置於路達桌上的二維零件外觀尺寸。
The machine options have been divided into 5 sections:
機台配件可分為五個部分：
The multipurpose bed system is also fully functional as a t-slot clamping and fixturing bed for non-vacuum hold down situations.
多功能床台系統同時也完全支援 T 形槽夾具及夾具床等非真空夾固功能。
The new AXYZ Smart Console brings unprecedented ease of use, context sensitive menus, realtime display of machine status and many more timesaving, useability and productivity features.
全新 AXYZ 智慧主控台帶來了前所未有的易用功能選單、即時機台狀態顯示以及更多的省時、實用和高產能功能。
The non-contacting design of the rotors leads to a longer pump life with lowmaintenance.
非接觸式轉子設計能提供更長的壽命以及低維護需求。
The option set that AXYZ International has developed over the last 20years iseasily the most diverse in the industry.
AXYZ 國際在過去的 20 年所開發配件組合為業界最多元化的組合。
The pneumatic I electric combination is best forheavier duty orcontinuous use applications.
氣動/電動組合最適合於高負荷或連續使用之應用。
The pneumatic switches are standard with auto zone switching systems.
標準氣動開關包含自動區域切換系統。

The primary application isdigital print finishing where the camera isable toquickly find and recognise conventional registration marks and adjust the machine cutting path to achieve exact alignment with printed shapes.
主要應用為攝影機可快速辨識數位列印圖層之傳統定位標誌，並調整機台切割路徑以精確符合列印圖形。
The result isacontinuous output of a microfine lubricant mist providing better cut finish and longer tool bitlife.
其連續噴出之微潤滑油霧提供更好的切削表面和更長的刀具壽命。
The saber blade isarobust and multi purpose tool ideal forcutting hard materials such as laminates, Styrene, Sintra and similar up to about 1-2mm thick.
彎刀為堅固耐用之多功能刀具，非常適用於切割厚度 1-2mm 以下之硬質材料如層板、合成樹脂、Sintra 板以及類似材料。
The standard gantry clearance is150mm for all AXYZ Series machines.
所有 AXYZ 系列機台標準支架高度為 150mm。
The tangential knife can be used for cutting styrene, composites, duct liner, X-board and many other materials.
裁刀可用於切割合成樹脂、合成物、玻璃纖維、合板以及其他多種材料。
The tangential knife is arobust knife cutting tool intended forheavier, thicker and harder materials than atraditional drag knife can accommodate.
裁刀為堅固耐用的切削刀具，用於傳統拖刀無法處理之較厚重以及較硬的材料。
The vacuum arm hose steel support arm effectively and conveniently provides a third hand insupporting the dust extraction vacuum hose.
真空鋼管臂能有效且便利地提供真空吸塵軟管支撐，
The vinyl cutting knife can easily be attached without having to remove the spindle and asan added bonus, doubles asan effective pen plotter.
塑膠切割刀具可不拆除主軸直接外加安裝，如出圖機般的使用。
The vinyl cutting knife can easily be attached to any Z axis and as an added bonus, doubles as an effective pen plotter.
塑膠切割刀具可輕易地外加於任何 Z 軸上，如出圖機般的使用，
These materials allpresent challenges for traditional router orknife tools, but the oscillating knife can slice through these materials with ease, delivering clean cutedges without fraying.
上述材料由傳統路達或刀具加工具極具挑戰性，但擺動刀可輕易處理以上材料，提供乾淨的切邊。
These spindles can be used manually or in conjunction with our ATC automatic tool changer carousel for automatic changing of tool bits.
這些主軸可手動或配合 ATC 自動換刀轉盤進行換刀。
This allows the operator to easily clear the machine bed of parts and waste and then reload the cutting area with more material to allow virtually continuous operation of the AXYZ Router.
幫助操作員輕鬆清裡機床零件和廢料，然後重新裝載更多的材料，使 AXYZ 雕刻機操作幾近連續。
This cartridge allows the use ofarotary 'Pizza Wheel' blade which is ideal forcutting tough orabrasive materials such as gasket.
此刀匣可使用旋轉“披薩輪形”刀，非常適用於切割或研磨如墊片等材料。
This cost effective option eliminates heat related parts growth, most common to plastics and softmetal machining and serves to provide better edge finish and longer tool bitlife.
此高成本效益配件可避免塑膠和軟金屬加工常見的熱相關零件膨脹，並提供更好的邊緣表面及更長的刀具壽命。
This is a heavy duty drag knife system that willfit into a standard 20 mm collet.
此重型夾頭拖刀系統使用 20 mm 標準筒夾，
This method provides forstraight cut corners atany angle aswell astrue radii when called for.
此方法能提供邊角直線切割同時能依要求半徑導角。
This robust knife design features Exacto style blades available in many sizes and strengths.
堅固的 Exacto 型刀鋒設計包含了多種尺寸及強度可供選擇。
This tangential knife cartridge is specially designed to hold knife blades at a 45° angle and can be used to create 'v' cuts in materials such as Xanita, Reboard and others.
裁刀匣係特別為裝載 45 度刀鋒設計，並可於合板 (Xanita、Reboard) 以及其他板材上進行 "V" 形切割。
This tooling configuration is popular forapplications that typically require only two orthree tooling processes.
此加工組態常用於一般僅使用兩刀或三刀之加工製程。

此將會是安裝程序中最困難的部分。
Three dimensional laser scanner forreverse engineering a 3D surface.
用於三維表面逆向工程之三維雷射掃描器。

藉由不斷進行研發，並與業界合作夥伴和供應商的密切合作，AXYZ 有能力生產為我們客戶帶來極大價值之大型機台配件組合。

可安裝多重刀架於支架上同時進行多份相同工作以增加效率。

With a maximum process width of 1524mm, the 4000 Series fits many materials with ease.
最大加工寬度為 1524mm，4000 系列能輕鬆處理多數材料。
With an industry proven 6.35mm top-loading spindle, it iswell suited totackle awide range of materials including plastics, aluminium, brass, and more.
使用業界認證的 6.35mm 上載式主軸，其適用於夾固多種材料如塑膠、鋁、黃銅以及更多材料。

其包含四個安裝螺栓和快速電源插頭，非常容易從路達桌上裝卸。
With more than 20 years of experience and thousands of CNC Routers installed and operating every day, AXYZ prides itself on manufacturing and selling robust, durable, and easy to use CNC Routers.
擁有超過 20 年的經驗且已安裝數千台 CNC 雕刻機，AXYZ 有自信製造及銷售強大、耐用且使用簡便的 CNC 雕刻機。
With such a wide choice of tooling you can now process a vast range of rigid and semi rigid materials from foam board and cardboard to plastics, woods and aluminium all on the same machine.
多種刀具選擇可處理廣泛的剛性和半剛性材料，於同一機台上可處理泡綿板、瓦愣紙、塑膠、木材及鋁等材料。

• 250 mm ball screw Zaxis stroke with astandard 150 mm clearance.
• 250 mm 滾珠螺桿 Z 軸行程，含 150 mm 間隙。
• Additional tooling options include drills, tangential and drag knives and plasma arc cutters.
• 額外的刀具配件包括鑽頭、裁刀、拖刀以及電漿電弧切削器等。
• All vacuum hold down beds come configured with a minimum of 5 independently controlled zones foroptimum hold down management.
• 所有真空固定床皆設置最少 5 個獨立控制區以最佳化固定管理。
• Automatic compensation for all location, rotation, stretch and skew distortions
• 自動補償所有位置、旋轉、拉伸和扭曲變形
• Fully integrated with AXYZ A2MC controller
• 完全整合 AXYZ A2MC 控制器
• Intuitive operator interface with full colour graphical image for fast and accurate operation
• 直覺的操作介面，彩色圖形化的圖像可供快速、準確地操作
• Standard aluminium universal hold down bed combines T-Slot clamping with vacuum hold down distribution system.
• 標準鋁萬用固定床，結合 T 形夾槽和真空固定系統。
• Standard connectivity to NC files from virtually any CAM software package including AXYZ PANELBuilder, EnRoute, ArtCam, Type 3,Mastercam, ProfileLab and more.
• 標準支援包括 AXYZ PANELBuilder、EnRoute、ArtCam、Type 3、Mastercam、ProfileLab 以及更多 CAM 套裝軟體之 NC 檔案。
• Works with programs from any CAM software
• 適用於任何 CAM 軟體之程式
